resources.string:
If your device doesn't come with a built in flashlight app, this app can be useful and fun! 

 By Culebras GIS 
 www.culebrasgis.info
Sorry, your device doesn\'t support flash light!

- Press the fish to switch on/off the device flashlight. 

- Press the device back button to close the app and turn off the flashlight. 

- With flashlight on, pressing the home or lock buttons will not turn it off. This means you can continue using the device with flashlight on.
An error occurred while accessing the camera
